name: Range Kandy
description: A boutique hotel with a traditional Sri Lankan vibe.

name: New Summer Garden Restaurant & Guest House
description: A nice place to get booze in the evening at beach, Cabanas with Thai & Chinese Bites.
An eco lodge right next to the Pidurangala Rock.
name: Back of Beyond  (Pidurangala)
Underneath the Mango Tree (UTMT, Dickwella)
description: One of Sri Lanka's most unique and funky hotels.

name: The Rascals (Kalpitiya)
description: The Rascals Kitesurfing Resort is a lovely retreat all the way in Kalpitiya. They offer a dynamic range of activities and a stellar experience.

name: Anawasal (Kalpitiya)
description: Anawasal is an idyllic resort tucked away somewhere by the lagoons of Kalpitiya. They've got a collection of cabanas, an extremely chilled out atmosphere and are pet-friendly. We loved the place!
A gorgeous beach resort and spa in the Maldives.
name: Olhuveli Beach & Spa
Diklande Estate Bungalow
description: Back of beyond's newest addition is an ideal place to spend your weekend and get some me-time.
bed and breakfast with cabanas on a relatively isolated patch of beach
name: Bara Beach Home
The Bungalow - Galle Fort
address: No. 5, Church Cross Street, Galle Fort, Galle
description: With its colonial elegance, comfortable accommodation, well trained staff, and the excellent food, The Bungalow - Galle Fort is a place that unites every bit of happiness that you're looking for in Galle.
Staying at the Equator Village gives you a neat balance between the resort experience and local life in the Maldives
address: S.Gan, Addu City, Rep of Maldives, 19010, Maldives
name: Equator Village, Gan Island
Podi Hoona - The Little Gecko Luxury Campsite
address: Yala National Park, Kirinda - Sithulpawwa road, Thissamaharamaya
description: An incredibly beautiful luxury campsite which is a treat for eco-lovers, birdwatchers, and people who enjoy genuine rusticity.
Jetwing Hotels' first city hotel in Colombo.
name: Jetwing Colombo 7
Meemure Camping
description: The only one place to do camping at Meemure with awesome package including 3 meals & 2 adventures

name: The Pool Bar (Galle Face Hotel)
address: Galle Face Hotel, 2, Galle Road, Colombo 03
description: Probably one of the best, and most classic views and venues in the city.
A safe, cosy spot perfect for tourists in Colombo 4.
name: Hangover Hostels Colombo

description: One of Hikka's oldest and most established beach restaurants & bars
name: Mambo's Hikkaduwa

description: A quirky boutique hotel on the rocky Talpe shore.
name: Owl & the Pussycat Hotel (Talpe)

description: Sun Aqua is a villa style hotel on the Pasikudah beach. It has a great pool, good food and is quite kid friendly.
name: Sun Aqua Pasikudah
Sky Pavilion
description: Located a bit far from the city, with the sky as your constant companion, this is the ideal place for a weekend getaway.

name: Anantara Peace Haven Resort (Tangalle)
description: A gorgeous resort in the Deep South, part of the international Anantara chain.
A lean luxury spot in Ahangama
name: Kabalana Hotel by Ceilao Villas (Ahangama)
Hangover Hostels (Airport)
description: Hangover Hostels have expanded: and are now just a hop and skip away from the airport!

name: Coconut At Cantaloupe Aqua
description: I can understand the appeal of Aqua to a certain clientele. It's probably a good place for a party. The beach isn't always swimmable, but there's a nice area where you can drinks some cocktails, watch the waves or even lounge in the plunge pool without getting your hair wet. And they play some decent music. But it's certainly not worth travelling too far out of your way for in terms of food.

name: OZO Colombo
description: OZO is a hotel that's just popped up on Marine Drive in Bambalapitiya, quite popular for having the highest bar in the city (ON14).

Just 30 minutes away, Reef's Edge is the perfect weekend getaway or extended lunch for the city-worn Colombo dweller. It's got a great beachfront location, dedicated staff, vibrant decor, and inspired food,.
name: Reef's Edge - Uswetakeiyawa
Lanka Rest Housess (Batticaloa)
description: If you're staying in Batticaloa town itself, this is the spot (as long as you don't mind basic accommodation). It's cheap, the staff are insanely nice, and the lawn and location can't be beat.

name: Uga Bay (Passikudah)
description: Uga Bay is one of Passikudah's hotel giants, located on a vast property spanning a significant breadth of the town's broad and beautiful beach. It's a five star, so you can expect good food, comfy beds and searing hot showers.

name: Grand Ella Motel
description: Owned by the Ceylon Hotel Corporation, the Grand Ella has a great view, okay service, and mediocre food.

name: Jetwing Kurulubedda
description: Rustic chic in Galle's unspoiled outskirts.

name: Galle Fort Hotel
description: One of the Fort's quintessential spots for accommodation and breakfast.

name: Jetwing Kaduruketha
description: Jetwing K. is one of the latest hotels by the popular chain, with a stellar line up of food, and a very rural, agricultural set-up.

name: Amangalla
description: One of the island's oldest and grandest colonial properties.

name: Amaloh by Jetwing
description: A charming beachside property on the Matara bay.

name: Tri Lanka
description: Sri Lanka's newest, chicest eco-resort.

name: Kikili House
description: A charming little hotel that feels like a home.

name: Church Street Social (The Fort Bazaar)
description: The Galle Fort's charming new boutique property

name: Jetwing Lighthouse Club
description: Like the famous Jetwing Lighthouse - but fancier.

name: JUCE Hotel
description: A super chill budget party hotel Down South.
A lovely little escape in the suburbs
address:
17/2, 
Sudharman Mawatha, 
Raja Maha Vihara Road, 
Pitakotte
name: Villa Escondite
Villa Santé
description: A luxe villa fringing the Kalpitiya lagoon.

name: Number 11
description: Former home of Geoffrey Bawa (possibly Sri Lanka's most famous contemporary architect)

name: Jetwing St. Andrews
description: A stunning refurbished old mansion in the heart of Nuwaraeliya.

name: Nihal's (Jetwing Lighthouse Club)
description: The main restaurant at the luxe Jetwing Lighthouse Club in Galle, serving up special degustation menus and bespoke dishes.

name: Jetwing Warwick Gardens
description: Warwick Gardens is a beautifully renovated Edwardian style bungalow nestled in the hills in Ambewela which encapsulates a perfect vacation in the hill country.

name: The Fortress Resort & Spa
address: The Fortress Resort & Spa, Koggala, Habaraduwa, Galle
description: A beautiful beach front luxury resort past Galle.
A fully-furnished serviced apartment in Colombo 06, with beautiful design.
name: Hotel AV15
Tartaruga Restaurant  (Unawatuna)
address:
Yaddehimulla Road, Unawatuna Beach,
Sri Lanka
description: Overlooking the sapphire blue waters of Unawatuna, Tartaruga delivers good food with an equally good view.

name: Citron Villa (Koggala)
address: Citron Villa, Meepe Hospital Road, Katukurunda, Habaraduwa, Koggala
description: A miniature villa in a quiet idyllic setting, inland from the seaside of Koggala.

name: Jetwing Ayurveda Pavilions
description: A serene escape in the midst of the bustling Negombo hotel strip.
The Safari Hotel in Tissa
name: The Safari Hotel (Tissa)

description: Arika Villa in Dambulla
address: Puwakattawala Road, off Dambulla-Matale Road, Dambulla
name: Arika Villa (Dambulla)
Cape Weligama
description: One of the island's top luxury getaways.
Mandira Bungalows in Hatton, Sri Lanka, located at the heart of the tea country.
name: Mandira Bungalows
W15 (Weligama)
description: A funky little boutique hotel on the beautiful Weligama beach strip.
Divyaa Lagoon in Kalpitiya
name: Divyaa Lagoon
Cinnamon Bey (Beruwala)
address:
Cinnamon Bey Beruwala,
Moragolla, Beruwala,
Sri Lanka.
description: A large and full-service luxury beach resort on the idyllic Southern Coast.

name: W15 Escape (Ahangama)
description: The stylish former Three by TPV property, on the Down South coast.

name: Earl’s Passikudah
description: The warm reception we received on arriving at Earl's was an early indication of how good a time we were going to have there.  Only a short walk away from Passikudah beach, this friendly and comfortable little hotel will serve you well.

name: Flamingo Restaurant (Ceylon City Hotel)
description: Flamingo Restaurant (which has been around forever) serves up an interesting mix of cuisines ranging from Arabic, Western,  Italian and Sri Lankan.
Okwin Resort in Nawalapitiya
name: Okwin Resort (Nawalapitiya)

description: The Beach Camp in Yala
name: The Beach Camp (Yala)

description: Deep within the ancient city of Dambulla, enveloped in mesmerizing greenery, The Paradise Resort & Spa is a luxury 4 star hotel.
name: The Paradise Resort & Spa (Dambulla)

description: Brooke Boutique in Dambulla
address: Ali Pallama,Madahapola Road, Airport- Road, Melsiripura, Dambulla
name: Brook Boutique (Dambulla)

description: Elephant Reach in Yala
name: Elephant Reach (Yala)

description: Cinnamon's big Kandy hotel, overlooking the Mahaweli River.
name: Cinnamon Citadel (Kandy)

description: The respected Jetwing's hotel by the Passikudah Bay, near Batticaloa.
name: Sunrise By Jetwing

description: One of the newest and most modern hotels in Jaffna.
name: Jetwing Jaffna

description: A boutique hotel near the surfable (and beautiful) Pottuvil Point but a bit away from the bustle of the main Pottuvil strip.
name: Kottukal Beach House (Pottuvil)

description: A boutique hotel which is close to Colombo (near Panadura) but with suitably secluded rooms.
name: Serene Pavilions (Wadduwa)

description: Hotel facing the Tissa Weva Lake, and with a pool for actual swimming.
address: Heritage Hotel Anuradhapura, Galwala Road, Anuradhapura
name: Heritage Hotel (Anuradhapura)

description: As the name implies, this Browns hotel is a chill spot on the Pasikudah Bay.
address: The Calm Resort & Spa, Pasikuda Rd, Kalkudah
name: The Calm Resort & Spa (Pasikudah)
Santani (Kandy)
description: A luxury wellness retreat overlooking Knuckles.

name: Shangri-La (Hambantota)
address: Sittrakala Estate, Chithragala, Ambalantota, Sri Lanka
description: Shangri-La's first foray into Sri Lanka, a full-service resort in the Deep South.

name: Jet Water Sports
description: Based out of Jetwing Lagoon, Jet Water sports lets you enjoy kayaking, canoeing, boat excursions and jet skis.
Cinnamon Red is the newest Colombo hotel, on Green Path. Their rooftop bar is the highest in the city and the view around the city is amazing.
address: 59, Ananda Kumaraswamy Mawatha, Colombo 03, Sri Lanka
name: Cinnamon Red
Theva Residency
description: Theva Residency is a small boutique hotel - and open restaurant - about a fifteen minute drive from Kandy's center. The view here of the empire city and the hills that surround it is spectacular.

name: Hotel J (Negombo)
description: Hotel J is a Jetwing budget hotel in Negombo - the rooms are comfy and the theme is pleasant.

name: Closenberg Hotel
description: Apparently built among the ruins of a Dutch fortalice, the Closenberg Hotel is an exquisite Colonial structure dating back to the 1800s.

name: Ruuk Village (Kalpitiya)
description: Ruuk Village is a cabana resort in Kalpitiya - it's a very outdoorsy holiday place ideal for people who like camping and spending time with nature. It's by the Puttalam lagoon, a Rs. 150 tuk ride from the main town, and the folks here can arrange must-do activities when you're up on the east cost, like boat rides, safaris and kite-surfing.

name: Yathra By Jetwing
description: Yathra (by Jetwing) is a houseboat that docks and sails on the Bentota River.

name: Mango House
address: 3, Layn Baan Cross Street,  Galle Fort, Galle
description: Mango House is a wonderful, simple little retreat in the Galle Fort. It's a villa-meets-boutique-hotel, cosy, restful and not so expensive.

name: Galle Heritage Villa
description: Galle Heritage Villa is a beautiful place to stay at in the Galle Fort - this massive house of sorts is by the same guys who brought us Jetwing Lighthouse.

name: Coral Rock By Bansei
description: Note that our review here is outdated. This hotel is no longer managed by Jetwing.

The Silva Treehouse is an amazing AirBnB getaway in Unawatuna. It's basically a beautiful large glasshouse - quiet, clean, with a soothing green view of surrounding jungle and the ocean in the distance.
name: Silva Tree
The Beach (All Suite Hotel)
description: The Beach is an all suite hotel in Negombo. They've got an unbeatable location, breathtaking views of the ocean and sunset, good food at their rooftop restaurant and great service.

name: OZO Kandy
description: OZO is a big, modern hotel in the Kandy city center. The restaurant and the roof bar are worth checking out.

name: Jetwing Lagoon
description: Jetwing Lagoon is a very cool luxury hotel in Negombo. What's unique about it how environmentally friendly they are, also their 100 meter long infinity pool.

Calamansi Cove by Jetwing is a villa based boutique hotel in Balapitiya. They offer spacious rooms in a serene, secluded setting overlooking the Balapitiya beach, and one of the best restaurants we've come across down south.
address: Wijerama Temple Rd, Balapitiya, Sri Lanka
name: Calamansi Cove by Jetwing

description: Jetwing  Yala is a geat place to stay over at when you're visiting Sri Lanka's wildlife central - huge pool, great views and a unique luxury-outdoors concept.
name: Jetwing Yala

description: City Beds is a budget hotel in Colombo, cosy, traveler-friendly and in a very central location.
address: 20, Regent Building, Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 1
name: City Beds
The Ceylon City Hotel
description: The Ceylon City Hotel is one of the newer new age hotels in Colombo. It's got good facilities at decent prices.

name: Hangover Hostel (Mirissa)
description: Hangover Hostel is a convenient and inexpensive lodging option for those looking to travel to Mirissa on a budget. It's a simple little space but they've got the essentials covered. They've got private rooms and dorms, both priced very reasonably.

name: Lantern (Mirissa)
description: Lantern is a well-equipped boutique hotel in Mirissa.

name: Amaya Beach Pasikuda
description: Amaya is one of the big hotels on Pasikuda bay. It's huge, and though looks-wise is a little old school, is still incredibly efficient and ideal for some holiday pampering.

name: The Palmyrah House
address: Thalaimannar Road, Karisal, Mannar Island, Mannar
description: The Palmyrah House is one of the few  proper hotels in Mannar.  The management has embraced the island's flora and fauna, creating an eco-friendly boutique hotel that offers a memorable experience.
Palm Beach Hotel is located in Mount Lavinia, it has the feel of a modern Sri Lankan hotel with rooms starting from about Rs. 7200.
name: Palm Beach Hotel
Hotel Alakamanda (Anuradhapura)
description: Hotel Alakamanda is a great place to relax after a day exploring the Sacred City of Anuradhapura. The hotel offers a little bit of luxury and excellent service, but it comes at a price.

name: Cinnamon Lodge Habarana
description: Spread over a  25-acre property that skirts a reservoir and thick jungle, Cinnamon Lodge in Habarana is an excellent place to get lost in for a few days.

name: Portofino Resort
description: Portofino Resort in Tangalle is a idyllic south coast getaway. The service is great, the spa is even better, and the views aren’t too shabby eithe
Ivory Inn is a mid sized bed and breakfast, located in Mount Lavinia. They have clean and comfortable rooms starting at around Rs. 3500.
name: Ivory Inn
Elephant Corridor
description: Elephant Corridor is a luxury boutique in sight of Sigiriya. Open since the 90s, it's one of the oldest boutique hotel on the island. With just 22 rooms and a vast premises, EC is ideal for a few days of seclusion.

name: Peacock Beach Hotel (Hambantota)
description: හරිම ලස්සන වගේම තරමක් ගැඹුරු මුහුදු තීරයක් අයිනේ පිහිටලා තියෙන හම්බන්තොට පීකෝක් හෝලටය දවසක දෙකක හොඳ නිවාඩුවක් ගත කරන්න නම් කියාපු තැනක් තමයි.

name: Saraii Village (Weerawila)
address: Randunu Kele Watte, Weerawila, Hambantota District
description: Saraii Village is a charming set of tree-houses and mud chalets near Hambantota. They also make an excellent rice and curry. Probably the best place to stay in the area.

name: Villa Red
description: If you're traveling in packs, Villa Red is a far better value than the package hotels in Bentota. You have full access to the river and watersports and have a really well-equipped villa to hang out in.
Hideaway is the best restaurant and probably the best hotel in Arugam Bay. It has excellent food and accommodation and thoughtful family management.
name: Hideaway Villas
The Wallawwa
description: The Wallawwa is one of the nicest hotels near the airport. It's an elegant family house converted into an excellent boutique hotel. What sets it apart is the proactive staff and the fact that it's a boutique hotel with fun stuff to do inside (croquet, RISK, Jenga, etc).

name: SaBaBa's
address: Whiskey Point, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province
description: SaBaBa's is basically the only place on Whiskey Point. It's run by Mambo's brother and is pretty chill. It's underground (no website/Facebook/etc), but if you show up they'll serve you.

name: Palm Villa Hotel (Mirissa)
description: Palm Villa is one of the best places to stay in Mirissa, if you can get it. Reasonable room rates, interesting rooms, swimmable beach and a reasonable distance from the main strip.

name: Pigeon Island Beach Resort
description: If you want to get away from the more crowded Nilaveli Beach Resort and have a decent, affordable meal, Pigeon Island Beach Resort is a good spot. It had a great owner (RIP) and continues to have good, hospitable staff.

name: The Artist's Residence - Piero House (Thalpe)
description: The Piero House in Thalpe truly is an artists residence. It's a magical space, creatively decorated and an ideal retreat for writers, artists, or general creatives. It's bikable distance to good restaurants in Thalpe and swimmable beach and you get a huge space for around Rs. 9,000 (double).
One of Sri Lanka's original South Coast boutique luxury hotels.
name: Aditya

description: One of Colombo’s prettier urban escapes, Colombo Courtyard is a boutique hotel in the heart of Colpetty. As it avoids the usual business hotel tag, the vibe is entirely different.
address: Alfred House Road, Colombo 00300, Sri Lanka
name: Colombo Courtyard

description: Maalu Maalu was the first resort to be developed on the then deserted Kalkudah beach in Passikudah and it quickly became one of the go to places in the area. Its iconic thatched chalets are a distinctive sight on the now more populated coastline.
name: Maalu Maalu Resort & Spa
Templeberg Villa
address: Babaragoda Road, off Akuressa Road, Galle
description: For a boutique experience without being completely isolated, this is a great spot. Lovely villa within 15 minutes of Galle, Thalpe and Una and about an hour and a half from Colombo.
A lovely boutique hotel, impeccably furnished and right on Kosgoda beach.
address: Sri Gnanawimala Mawatha, Kosgoda, Sri lanka
name: Saffron & Blue (Jetwing)

description: Fits' Margosa in Chunnakam, Jaffna is an elegant refurbished 19th Century mansion about 9km away from the main town, and possibly one of the only upscale hotels at the very North.
address: Station Road, Urelu North, Chunnakam, Jaffna
name: Fits Pavilion Margosa (Jaffna)

description: 906 is the name of a Taru Villa in Hikkaduwa - they've also got similarly beautiful holiday-getaways in Bentota and Colombo. 906 is a very comfy, private relaxing space for about six people, the service is awesome, and it's by the beach.
name: 906 (Taru Villas)
The Kingsbury
description: The Kingsbury hotel is a massive unmistakable building if you're driving by Galle Face - it's one of the grander ones in the city, with an old Victorian theme (at least with the interior). The views from the hotel, especially from the rooftop bar, are pretty cool. And we thought the hotel deserved points for aesthetics, if the general vibe of extravagance doesn't put you off.

The Colombo City Hostel has two brand-new, sparkling clean eight-bed dorms (another is on the way), eight downright posh shower-loo rooms and well thought out public spaces. This might be the best communal accommodation in the city.
address: 177, R. A. De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
name: Colombo City Hostel

description: As a bonus the couple who run the guesthouse cook up some pretty excellent meals – so you can even over come the Kandy food issue….
name: Forest Glen, Kandy

description: The Maskeliya-Oya Family Park Resort is a keenly priced gem. Nestled in a deep, impossibly lush valley a few kilometers from Norton Bridge (15km from Hatton town) the modern chalets are comfortable and squeaky clean and, best of all, enjoy views over steep, thickly forested mountainside.
name: Maskeliya Oya Family Park

description: The best beach in Sri Lanka. That's a bold claim but I'll stand by it. I've been beach hunting in out of the way parts of the country for years and I've never found anything that surpasses Marble Beach.
name: Marble Beach Airforce Resort

description: or me, this is really the best place to stay in the vicinity of Sigiriya. Well designed mud and wood cottages in the middle of the jungle that, with their open and swank modern bathroom fixtures manage to feel almost luxurious.
name: Back Of Beyond (Dehigahaela, Sigiriya)

description: This is a real gem.  In a prime location on the bank of the beautiful Castlereagh Reservoir- Castlereagh family cottages offers, in its price range, some of the best accommodation on the island. At the moment there are just two cosy, modern cottages but they each have multiple rooms and can house more than 6 people - (the larger one can accommodate 10).
name: Castlereagh Family Cottages

address: Meena Ella Nursery, Hakgala, Nuwara Eliya
name: Humbugs Bungalow Nuwara Eliya

description: The Marriot is conveniently located right at the center of the Weligama Bay. Aside from accommodating tourists and travelers, it also offers options for banquets and conference facilities.
name: The Marriot Weligama
The Fishing Huts (Maskeliya)
description: The Fishing Huts is a set of cabins built during British days, but it is not a fishing location any more. It is located at the edge of Mooray Estate in Maskeliya which spans over 3000 acres of land. The cabins are built on the bank of Baththulu-Oya, which separates the tea estate from the Adam's Peak Wilderness Sanctuary.

name: The Woods
description: A beautiful cottage hotel that provides the genuine jungle experience nestled in the wilderness of Beragala.

If wildlife, bird-watching and unadulterated nature are your thing, Banyan Camp is perfect. Leave anything that beeps or flashes in the car, and spend a few solid hours on the lake or stargazing at the universe.
name: Banyan Camp (Hambegamuwa)

description: Lighthouse is one place that we actually felt bad leaving. The hotel is really connected to its location so you feel quite comfortably wrapped in the sunset and beach. Truly an iconic hotel.
name: Jetwing Lighthouse
